description: This is a Java source file defining a REST controller class for a Spring Boot application. It provides basic endpoints such as root greeting, API documentation redirection, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A Spring RestController providing basic endpoints for greeting, documentation access, health check, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/' and returns a welcome message.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/docs' and redirects to Swagger UI, building the URL based on the incoming request.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/health' and returns application's health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/api/info' and returns basic application info.
